Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I do development on my Android device?  OK, so I've just got a new Kindle Fire (which I love), and I've been wondering:Can I develop Java programs on my Kindle?Is this even possible? Can a Gingerbread tablet do this?  I am looking for an offline solution.Note: This is not a programming question, so it would be off-topic on any other SE site
Title: Code/Program Java on Kindle Fire

history.Text: OK, so I've just got a new Kindle Fire (which I love), and I've been wondering:**Can I develop programs and scripts in different languages on my Kindle?**Is this even possible? Can a Gingerbread tablet do this?  *Note: This is not a programming question, so it would be off-topic on any other SE site*

history.Comment: Kindle is different from Kindle Fire
